title: Rate of flow of water in a tank part - b

content.question: Find the average rate at which water is draining from the tank between time t=0 and time t=8 hours.

frqParts.text: Find the average rate at which water is draining from the tank between time t=0 and time t=8 hours.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
